Flask-AppBuilder
================

.. module:: flask.ext.appbuilder

Simple and rapid Application builder, built on top of `Flask <http://flask.pocoo.org/>`_.
includes detailed security, auto form generation, google charts and much more.

Important Note:

Version 0.3.N had some changes look at chapter :doc:`versions`

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   intro
   instalation
   quickhowto
   quickminimal
   quickcharts
   quickfiles
   i18n
   config
   security
   api
   versions
